mapper.select: SELECT ID, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_NBR, COLUMN_NAME, CURRENT_POS, STEP_SIZE, VERSION, CDATE, EDATE FROM T_SEQ_INCREMENT WHERE TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TABLE_NBR = #{tableNbr,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND COLUMN_NAME = #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SEQ_INCREMENT( TABLE_NAME, TABLE_NBR, COLUMN_NAME, CURRENT_POS, STEP_SIZE, VERSION, CDATE, EDATE) VALUES ( #{seqIncrement.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqIncrement.tableNbr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seqIncrement.columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqIncrement.currentPos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seqIncrement.stepSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seqIncrement.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seqIncrement.cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seqIncrement.edate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
